text: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.

spoken_lines.speaker: father
spoken_lines.line: I am here and I am responsible for you. You are not unguarded. You are not alone in the dark.

spoken_lines.speaker: spirit
spoken_lines.line: Let your chest drop. Breathe out. You don't have to brace for losing everything anymore.

body_note: Chest and diaphragm soften from survival tension. Spine no longer hyper-alert. You are being kept, not hunted.

text: He makes me lie down in green pastures. He leads me beside still waters.

segments.phrase: He makes me lie down in green pastures
He leads me beside still waters

spoken_lines.speaker: spirit
spoken_lines.line: It's safe to unclench your legs. You don't have to run right now.

spoken_lines.speaker: fruit
spoken_lines.line: Peace is not laziness. Peace is medicine. Receive it.

codon.meaning: Rest allowed / body allowed to recover

body_note: Knees and feet stop prepping to flee. The field around you says 'not in danger'.
